name: PHOTONICA EXPERIENCE: Travel Photography Workshops in Nicaragua
description:
Portraiture, landscape, nature, reportage, street photography...  This is a unique experience offered to
anyone passionate about photography who wants to learn how to get the most out
of his/her photo gear. Improve your photography skills assisted by a
professional photographer with years of experience in both the educational and
editorial fields. They will accompany you during your trip and will provide you
with help and advice. Personal assistance and image reviews in group session
will help you to figure out the best way to create your own style, find your
own light and get your story told.
